attributes.action: No Claims Discount should be applied to more than one car for same driver.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to raise a petition against Insurance Companies to allow No Claims Discount earned to be applicable to all Policies and not only to one car. I have bought a second car recently however have to pay the Full amount despite being claim free for more than 20 years. I am the same driver so why not get discount on any policy that I have? This is completely unfair my car has not earned the No Claims, it is myself as a person who has earned it.
